TopicTitle: Looking for a extendable RCS thruster mod.

Articles.Content:
Looking for a mod that added RCS thrusters on arms that could be extended outwards and forwards. Used it in a previous version of KSP but can't find it this time.

All help appreciated.
That was in a Bobcat mod pack, the FLY space tug parts pack (combined with something else, MPSS?) if I remember correctly.

Thanks Eric! You were spot on.

It was [0.18.2] MPSS Nautilus 1.2 + FLY Orbital tug 1.0.
